summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 77E, page 182 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone the property located at 9461 Olson Place Southwest from Lowrise-2 (L-2) zone to Neighborhood Commercial 1 zone with a thirty-foot height limitation (NC-1/30') and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Washington Mutual Savings Bank, C.F. 299197)
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
